metadata.name: HackTool - F-Secure C3 Load by Rundll32
metadata.comment: F-Secure C3 produces DLLs with a default exported StartNodeRelay function.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('rundll32.exe')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.dll')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('startnoderelay')))

output.summary: F-Secure C3 produces DLLs with a default exported StartNodeRelay function.
